input.sentences: the city spent a fortune on fireworks to celebrate its 200th birthday .
the display started well | but nothing unexpected .
near the end | it was a wonder how the fireworks exploded in the right way at the right time .
the grande finale left the audience in silent awe .
output.sentences: The city probably spent a fortune paying for all of those fireworks.
It was an unexpected display when the fireworks started.
The explosions grew increasingly louder as it went on.
Over time, a lot of fireworks exploded.
The grande finale finished and left the sky silent.
